TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit BaseCompareValidator extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator
Public MustInherit Class BaseCompareValidator Inherits BaseValidator

summary.span: 作为执行类型化比较的验证控件的抽象基类。

span.span: Serves as the abstract base class for validation controls that perform typed comparisons.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类继承的验证控件，用于比较值，如和控件，以提供基本的常用功能。The class is inherited by validation controls that compare values, such as the and controls, to provide basic common functionality. 使用类型的值进行比较之前转换为属性以指定的数据。Use the property to specify the data type that that the values are converted to before being compared. > [!NOTE] > 如果要验证的输入控件的值无法转换为指定的数据类型，验证将失败。If the value of the input control being validated cannot be converted to the specified data type, validation fails. 验证控件属性设置为`false`。The property of the validation control is set to `false`. 类还包含几个静态属性和方法时执行比较验证非常有用。The class also contains several static properties and methods that are useful when performing comparison validations. 您可以确定是否可以通过使用转换为特定的数据类型 string方法。You can determine whether a string can be converted to a specific data type by using the method. 中包含可以用两位数年份表示的最大年份属性。The maximum year that can be represented by a two-digit year is contained in the property. 方法，可将两位数的年份转换为四位数年份。The method allows you to convert a two-digit year to a four-digit year. > [!NOTE] > 当使用验证程序控件派生自控件内部控制，请确保验证程序控件与之关联的控件相同的面板。When you use validator controls that derive from the control inside an control, make sure that the validator control and the control it is associated with are in the same panel. 有关使用详细信息控制部分页面更新，请参阅[局部页面呈现概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5c12736d-d9e9-464a-9388-3fe0f9f49e49)。For more information about using the control for partial-page updates, see [Partial-Page Rendering Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5c12736d-d9e9-464a-9388-3fe0f9f49e49). 有关验证控件的详细信息，请参阅。For more information about validation controls, see . ## 可访问性Accessibility 默认情况下，此控件呈现的标记可能不符合可访问性标准，如 Web 内容辅助功能准则 1.0 (WCAG) 优先级为 1 指导原则。The markup rendered by default for this control might not conform to accessibility standards such as the Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 1.0 (WCAG) priority 1 guidelines. 有关此控件的辅助功能支持的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 控件和可访问性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0)。For details about accessibility support for this control, see [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0).

summary.span: 将需要为控件呈现的 HTML 特性和样式添加到指定的 对象。

span.span: Adds the HTML attributes and styles that need to be rendered for the control to the specified object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法用来呈现该控件的 HTML 标记中的控件的属性。The method is used to render the attributes of the control in the HTML tag for the control. 此方法通常重写由控件开发人员在派生类中，若要将适当的特性和样式控件的输出流。This method is typically overridden by control developers in derived classes to insert the appropriate attributes and styles to the output stream for a control.

span.para: 重写时方法，请务必调用基类中的相应方法。否则，将不呈现在基类中包含的属性。
When overriding the method, be sure to call the corresponding method in the base class. Otherwise, the attributes contained in the base class will not be rendered.

span.span: if the specified data string can be converted to the specified data type; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法，以确定是否可以转换为指定的数据类型的指定的字符串。Use the method to determine whether the specified string can be converted to the specified data type. 此方法通常用于测试是否字符串可以在执行取决于该数据类型的操作之前转换为兼容的数据类型。This method is commonly used to test whether a string can be converted to a compatible data type before performing an operation that depends on that data type. 此版本的方法测试使用当前区域性使用的格式的值。This version of the method tests the value using the format used by the current culture. 若要测试使用区域性特定格式的值，请使用重载版本的此方法。To test the value using a culture-neutral format, use the overloaded version of this method. ## Examples 下面的示例演示了如何使用方法来比较两个整数值，并确定是否可以转换的第二个整数。The following example demonstrates using the method to compare two integer values and determine whether the second integer can be converted. [!code-aspx-csharp[BaseCompareValidatorCanConvert#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BaseCompareValidatorCanConvert/CS/basecomparevalidatorcanconvertcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[BaseCompareValidatorCanConvert#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BaseCompareValidatorCanConvert/VB/basecomparevalidatorcanconvertvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法，以确定是否可以转换为指定的数据类型的指定的字符串。Use the method to determine whether the specified string can be converted to the specified data type. 此方法通常用于测试是否字符串可以在执行取决于该数据类型的操作之前转换为兼容的数据类型。This method is commonly used to test whether a string can be converted to a compatible data type before performing an operation that depends on that data type. 若要指示应使用非特定区域性格式测试值，请传入`true`为`cultureInvariant`参数; 否则，使用当前区域性使用的格式测试值。To indicate that values should be tested using a culture-neutral format, pass in `true` for the `cultureInvariant` parameter; otherwise, values are tested using the format used by the current culture. 在测试时使用当前区域性使用的格式的值，请考虑使用重载版本的此方法。When testing a value using the format used by the current culture, consider using the overloaded version of this method.

span.span: if the parameter relates to the parameter in the manner specified by the parameter; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法用于测试是否的值`leftText`参数的值与相关`rightText`参数中指定的方式`op`参数。The method is used to test whether the value of the `leftText` parameter relates to the value of the `rightText` parameter in the manner specified by the `op` parameter. `type`参数指定要比较的值的数据类型。The `type` parameter specifies the data type of the values being compared. > [!NOTE] > 如果`op`参数设置为`ValidationCompareOperator.DataTypeCheck`，此方法测试的值`leftText`参数指定的数据类型为`type`参数。If the `op` parameter is set to `ValidationCompareOperator.DataTypeCheck`, this method tests only the value of the `leftText` parameter for the data type specified by the `type` parameter. `rightText`参数将被忽略。The `rightText` parameter is ignored. 此版本的方法将使用当前区域性使用的格式的值进行比较。This version of the method compares the values using the format used by the current culture. 若要比较的值使用非特定区域性格式，使用重载版本的此方法。To compare the values using a culture-neutral format, use the overloaded version of this method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法用于测试是否的值`leftText`参数的值与相关`rightText`参数中指定的方式`op`参数。The method is used to test whether the value of the `leftText` parameter relates to the value of the `rightText` parameter in the manner specified by the `op` parameter. `type`参数指定要比较的值的数据类型。The `type` parameter specifies the data type of the values being compared. > [!NOTE] > 如果`op`参数设置为`ValidationCompareOperator.DataTypeCheck`，此方法测试的值`leftText`参数指定的数据类型为`type`参数。If the `op` parameter is set to `ValidationCompareOperator.DataTypeCheck`, this method tests only the value of the `leftText` parameter for the data type specified by the `type` parameter. `rightText`参数将被忽略。The `rightText` parameter is ignored. 若要指示应使用非特定区域性格式比较值，请传入`true`有关`cultureInvariantLeftText`和`cultureInvariantRightText`参数; 否则，使用当前区域性使用的格式比较值。To indicate that values should be compared using a culture-neutral format, pass in `true` for the `cultureInvariantLeftText` and `cultureInvariantRightText` parameters; otherwise, the values are compared using the format used by the current culture. 在比较时使用当前区域性使用的格式的值，请考虑使用重载版本的此方法。When comparing values using the format used by the current culture, consider using the overloaded version of this method.

span.span: if the conversion is successful; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法用于将文本转换成指定的数据类型的对象。The method is used to convert text into an object of the specified data type. 尽管该方法返回`true`或`false`若要指示转换是否成功，转换后的值存储在`value``out`参数。Although the method returns `true` or `false` to indicate whether the conversion was successful, the converted value is stored in the `value` `out` parameter. > [!NOTE] > 如果转换成功，`value`参数设置为`null`。If the conversion is unsuccessful, the `value` parameter is set to `null`. 此版本的方法将转换的值使用当前区域性使用的格式。This version of the method converts values using the format used by the current culture. 若要转换的值使用非特定区域性格式，使用重载版本的此方法。To convert values using a culture-neutral format, use the overloaded version of this method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法用于将文本转换成指定的数据类型的对象。The method is used to convert text into an object of the specified data type. 尽管该方法返回`true`或`false`若要指示转换是否成功，转换后的值存储在`value``out`参数。Although the method returns `true` or `false` to indicate whether the conversion was successful, the converted value is stored in the `value` `out` parameter. > [!NOTE] > 如果转换成功，`value`参数设置为`null`。If the conversion is unsuccessful, the `value` parameter is set to `null`. 若要指示应使用非特定区域性格式转换值，请传入`true`为`cultureInvariant`参数; 否则，值会转换使用当前区域性使用的格式。To indicate that values should be converted using a culture-neutral format, pass in `true` for the `cultureInvariant` parameter; otherwise, values are converted using the format used by the current culture. 如果转换使用当前区域性使用的格式的值，请考虑使用重载版本的此方法。When converting a value using the format used by the current culture, consider using the overloaded version of this method.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否在比较之前将值转换为非特定区域性格式。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether values are converted to a culture-neutral format before being compared.

value.span: 如果在比较之前要将值转换为非特定区域性格式，则为 ；否则为 。默认为 。

span.span: to convert values to a culture-neutral format before they are compared; otherwise, .The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当属性设置为`true`，不强类型控件的属性进行比较之前转换为非特定区域性格式。When the property is set to `true`, properties of the control that are not strongly typed are converted to a culture-neutral format before being compared. 当此属性设置为`false`，值将转换为当前区域性的格式。When this property is set to `false`, values are converted to the format of the current culture. 属性不会影响由控件在网页上的用户输入的值。The property does not affect values that are entered by users of the control on a Web page. 不能设置此属性，通过主题或样式表主题。This property cannot be set by themes or by style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅并[ASP.NET 主题和外观](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).

summary.span: 获取可以用两位数的年份表示的最大年份。

span.span: Gets the maximum year that can be represented by a two-digit year.

value.span: 可以用两位数的年份表示的最大年份。

span.span: The maximum year that can be represented by a two-digit year.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来确定可以用在 100 年范围内的两位数年份表示的最大年份。Use the property to determine the maximum year that can be represented by a two-digit year in a 100-year range. 例如，如果此属性包含值`2029`，可以表示 1930 年到 2029 年之间使用两位数年份。For example, if this property contains the value `2029`, you can represent the years 1930 to 2029 using a two-digit year. 两位数年份 30 被解释为 1930 年，而 29 被解释为 2029年。The two-digit year 30 is interpreted as 1930, while 29 is interpreted as 2029. 不能直接调用更改此属性的值但是，可以更改可以通过设置两位数的年份表示的最大年份属性。You cannot change the value of this property directly; however, you can change the maximum year that can be represented by a two-digit year by setting the property.

summary.span: 确定是否可以为更新的（“上级”）浏览器呈现验证控件。

span.span: Determines whether the validation control can be rendered for a newer ("uplevel") browser.

returns.span: 如果可以为“上级”浏览器呈现验证控件，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the validation control can be rendered for an "uplevel" browser; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是主要由一个帮助器函数属性来确定客户端浏览器是否支持"上一级"呈现 （较新的浏览器上呈现）。The method is a helper function used primarily by the property to determine whether the client's browser supports "uplevel" rendering (rendering on a newer browser). 类重写此方法以返回`false`如果当前区域性使用非公历日历。The class overrides this method to return `false` if the current culture uses a non-Gregorian calendar. > [!NOTE] > 此方法主要由控件开发人员使用。This method is used primarily by control developers.

span.para: 重写时方法，请务必调用基类中的相应方法。否则，将跳过的基类中定义的条件。
When overriding the method, be sure to call the corresponding method in the base class. Otherwise, conditions defined in the base class will be bypassed.

MemberSignature.Value: protected static string GetDateElementOrder ();
.method familystatic hidebysig string GetDateElementOrder() cil managed
Protected Shared Function GetDateElementOrder () As String
protected: static System::String ^ GetDateElementOrder();
static member GetDateElementOrder : unit -> string

summary.span: 确定当前区域性日期值中年、月和日的顺序。

span.span: Determines the order in which the month, day, and year appear in a date value for the current culture.

returns.span: 一个字符串，表示当前区域性日期值中年、月和日的显示顺序。

span.span: A string that represents the order in which the month, day, and year appear in a date value for the current culture.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 月、 日和年的日期值可以出现在不同的顺序，具体取决于当前区域性设置。The month, day, and year of a date value can appear in different orders depending on the current culture settings. 方法用于确定这些值的显示的顺序。The method is used to determine the order in which these values appear. 下表显示了此方法返回的不同值。The following table shows the different values returned by this method. |日期元素顺序Date element order|返回值Return value| |------------------------|------------------| |日、 月、 年Day, Month, Year|"dmy""dmy"| |月、 日、 年Month, Day, Year|"mdy""mdy"| |年、 月、 日Year, Month, Day|"要求使用 ymd""ymd"|

MemberSignature.Value: protected static int GetFullYear (int shortYear);

Protected Shared Function GetFullYear (shortYear As Integer) As Integer
protected: static int GetFullYear(int shortYear);
static member GetFullYear : int -> int

span.span: A two-digit year.

summary.span: 生成指定的两位数的年份的四位数年份表示形式。

span.span: Generates the four-digit year representation of the specified two-digit year.

returns.span: 指定的两位数的年份的四位数年份表示形式。

span.span: The four-digit year representation of the specified two-digit year.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法生成指定的两位数年份的四位数年份表示形式。Use the method to generate the four-digit year representation of the specified two-digit year. 四位数年份表示形式上的值取决于属性，其中包含可以用在 100 年范围内的两位数年份表示的最大年份。The four-digit year representation depends on the value of the property, which contains the maximum year that can be represented by a two-digit year in a 100-year range. 例如，如果属性包含值`2029`，则方法返回介于 1930年和 2029年年。For example, if the property contains the value `2029`, the method returns a year between 1930 and 2029. 两位数年份 30 被解释为 1930 年，而 29 被解释为 2029年。The two-digit year 30 is interpreted as 1930, while 29 is interpreted as 2029. 您可以更改可以通过设置两位数的年份表示的最大年份属性。You can change the maximum year that can be represented by a two-digit year by setting the property. > [!NOTE] > 由于此方法是`static`，可以使用它而不符合条件的方法名称以及类名称-例如，通过创建类的实例`BaseCompareValidator.GetFullYear`。Because this method is `static`, you can use it without creating an instance of the class by qualifying the method name along with the class name--for example, `BaseCompareValidator.GetFullYear`.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationDataType Type { get; set; }
.property instance valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationDataType Type
Public Property Type As ValidationDataType
public: property System::Web::UI::WebControls::ValidationDataType Type { System::Web::UI::WebControls::ValidationDataType get(); void set(System::Web::UI::WebControls::ValidationDataType value); };
member this.Type : System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationDataType with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置在比较之前将所比较的值转换到的数据类型。

span.span: Gets or sets the data type that the values being compared are converted to before the comparison is made.
One of the enumeration values.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来指定用于比较的数据类型。Use the property to specify the data type used for comparison. 属性以不同的方式由各种比较验证控件。The property is used differently by the various comparison validation controls. > [!IMPORTANT] > 当属性设置为和当前的日历类型为非公历时，验证程序执行仅服务器端验证。When the property is set to and the current calendar type is non-Gregorian, the validator performs server-side validation only. 验证程序客户端脚本支持仅公历日历。The validator client script supports only Gregorian calendars. 例如，在控件，要进行比较 （上限、 下限和输入控件的值） 的所有值将转换为指定的数据类型之前执行任何比较。For example, in the control, all values being compared (the upper bound, lower bound, and value of the input control) are converted to the specified data type before any comparison is performed. 但是，如果您使用控件，并设置其属性设置为`ValidationCompareOperator.DataTypeCheck`，仅输入控件的值转换为指定的数据类型。However, if you use a control and set its property to `ValidationCompareOperator.DataTypeCheck`, only the value of the input control is converted to the specified data type. > [!NOTE] > 与验证控件关联的输入控件的值无法转换为指定的数据类型，如果验证失败。If the value of the input control associated with the validation control cannot be converted to the specified data type, validation fails. 验证控件属性设置为`false`。The property of the validation control is set to `false`. 下表列出了可用于值属性。The following table lists the values that you can use for the property. |数据类型Data type|描述Description| |---------------|-----------------| |`String`|指定的字符串数据类型。Specifies a string data type.| |`Integer`|指定 32 位有符号的整数数据类型。Specifies a 32-bit signed integer data type.| |`Double`|指定双精度浮点数字数据类型。Specifies a double-precision floating-point number data type.| |`Date`|指定日期数据类型。Specifies a date data type.| |`Currency`|指定货币数据类型。Specifies a monetary data type.| 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅并[ASP.NET 主题和外观](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性来指定要比较的值进行比较之前将转换为的数据类型。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the data type that the values being compared are converted to before the comparison is made. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic CompareValidator Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic CompareValidator Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic CompareValidator Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic CompareValidator Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

exception.span: 指定的数据类型不是 值之一。

span.span: The specified data type is not one of the values.
